texts.biography: In the form of a warrior with deer's head and glittering wings, Peryt is venerated as the embodiment of a protective spirit and commands the forest animals against invaders. Though imposing, his wings no longer allow him to fly because of a combat injury decades ago.
texts.name: Peryt

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Stags by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels.
specialty.name: Stag Spirit
